text: Janelle Monáe addressed the crowd at the Grammys on Sunday night with a speech about the #TimesUp movement. “We come in peace, but we mean business," she said. "And to those who would dare try to silence us, we offer you two words: Time’s Up.”
title: Janelle Monae on #TimesUp: 'We come in peace, but we mean business' - Los Angeles Times
